import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import style from './navbar.module.scss' import clsx from 'clsx' import { useState } from 'react' export default function () { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(0) return (

shopping cart

{amount}
) }
